title: Ticket #5390: HTCondor View: Ignore trailing comma on inbound JSON
description:
If we're loading data from JSON, and there is a trailing comma, delete it before trying to parse it.

If we don't, it's an error. The error is a nuisance for automatically creating the JSON; we need to special case to emit a comma before adding a new entry, but not if we're adding the first entry.

Should be pretty easy, less than an hour's work.
remarks:
2015-Nov-16 15:12:32 by adesmet:
Done. Also added some tests for various types of input we should read to ensure we can still read them.

2015-Nov-23 13:24:15 by adesmet:
Pull request made upstream.
creator: adesmet
